item.title: Alternatives to Firefox Send
item.description: As many of you have probably seen, Firefox launched their encrypted file sharing system, However the service is discontinued right now, I’ll share your curated sharing tools which have a client-side encryption feature.You can find a similar service hosted by structures in which we have trust by going to the following sites:
